definition: Thebes, place name in ancient Egypt/Thebes, ancient Greek city state
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: Creon is king of Thebes, bound to the duties of rule.
sentences.chinese: Creon是国王的底比斯，必然的责任规则。

sentences.english: Niobe, the queen of Thebes, had indeed good reason to be proud of her herself .
sentences.chinese: 底比斯王后尼俄伯的确该为自己感到骄傲。

sentences.english: My travails, I have said, began in a garden in Thebes .
sentences.chinese: 我说过，我的艰辛是在底比斯的一座花园里开始的。

sentences.english: Antigone's marriage is worth more to Thebes than her death.
sentences.chinese: 安提戈涅的婚姻是值得更多的底比斯比她的死因。

sentences.english: There is a picture of this operation on one of the buildings at Thebes .
sentences.chinese: 在底比斯一建筑里有一幅这样操作的图片。

sentences.english: These five joined with Cadmus in building his city, to which they gave the name of Thebes.
sentences.chinese: 他们协助卡德摩斯建造了一座城，称之为底比斯。

sentences.english: They are currently working at an excavation at Theban Tomb Sixteen.
sentences.chinese: 他们目前正处于十六墓在底比斯挖掘。

sentences.english: He called the Theban and Corinthian shepherds to prove the truth.
sentences.chinese: 他叫来底比斯的和科林斯族牧羊人来证明这个事实。

sentences.english: The Athenians, when they heard what had happened to Thebes, very quickly surrendered.
sentences.chinese: 雅典人听到了底比斯城发生的情况，很快就投降了。

sentences.english: Across the river Nile from Thebes lies Egypt's royal burial ground.
sentences.chinese: 埃及的皇家陵墓位于尼罗河的底比斯。

sentences.english: The mummy is that of Shepenmut who was once a singer in the Temple of Thebes.
sentences.chinese: 这是曾在底比斯神殿里当过歌手的赛潘姆特木乃伊。

sentences.english: Tiresias was a blind, dark seeing prophet of Thebes.
sentences.chinese: 泰瑞西斯是位只能看见黑暗的底比斯先知。

sentences.english: The area covers and surrounds the place where the city of Thebes once stood.
sentences.chinese: 该地区及其周围覆盖的地方，一旦站在底比斯城。

sentences.english: Red granite was commonly used in Thebes for the sarcophagi of high officials.
sentences.chinese: 红色花岗岩是常用的官员在底比斯为石棺高。

pinyin: Ya4 li4 shan1 da4 li3 ya4

definition: Cyrus the Great (ca. 600-530 BC), the founder of the Persian Empire and the conqueror of Babylon
Phoenicia, ancient civilization along the coast of the Mediterranean Sea

pinyin: Ya4 li4 shan1 da4 Da4 di4

definition: Syracuse, Sicily/also written 錫拉庫薩|锡拉库萨[Xi1 la1 ku4 sa4]
